home.name: The Dungeon Gate
home.description_hint: rusted iron door, flickering torch sconces, ancient warning carved in stone, damp stone walls

a.name: Hall of Fallen Warriors
a.description_hint: skeletal soldiers in rusted armor leaning against walls, a stone table with a faded dungeon map, four doorways

b.name: The Forbidden Library
b.description_hint: tall wooden shelves packed with black leather-bound books, some volumes trembling on their own, a nearly-spent candle on a reading desk

boss.name: The Guardian's Throne
boss.description_hint: vaulted chamber with a ceiling lost in darkness, obsidian throne surrounded by massive claw marks scratched into the stone floor, five passages leading outward

c.name: The Underground Prison
c.description_hint: rows of rusted iron cells along a narrow corridor, tally marks scratched deep into the walls, smell of rot and the sound of dripping water

d.name: The Forgotten Armory
d.description_hint: racks of broken swords and shattered shields, a small iron chest with a red wax seal sitting untouched in the far corner

t.name: Chamber of the Dark Core
t.description_hint: the deepest chamber, black crystal floor reflecting slightly wrong shadows, a stone altar at the centre with a pulsing red crystal that beats like a heart
